entries.description: feat(Amazon Q Code Transformation): warn user if absolute path found in pom.xml
feat(Amazon Q Code Transformation): show pro tier users estimated cost of /transform on projects over 100K lines
fix(Amazon Q Code Transformation): prevent empty chat bubble from appearing when starting or cancelling a transformation
Amazon Q /dev: include a retry option for the same prompt after folder reselection
Fix inability to open files on double click and open context menu on right click in the S3 bucket viewer
fix(amazonq): Amazon Q chat `@workspace` uses more than 20% cpu
Fix 'Cannot create extension' in AWS Toolkit
